body:
Hello I'm back a lot to catch up on many things happened in Tas for me to talk about. I did spend a week there without Wifi. :/

Wifi there was pretty bad :L

title: I'm Back

replies.body: Welcome back to the online world kev!
replies.body_tagged: Welcome back to the online world kev!

replies.body: Thanks Sean I missed a lot of things my Facebook and Google feed are booming with Notifications. Also how was your meeting with IRL people?
